```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Global parameters
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    echo = TRUE,
    fig.asp = 0.618,
    out.width  = "100%",
    fig.align  = "center",
    comment = "#>",
    out.width = "100",
    error = TRUE
)
```
